thread.title: Sam
thread.title_full: Alpha Flight Guru reviewed by Sam

author: Sam
title: Sam
text: I have used Alpha Flight Guru, and Raphael Tuting, 3 times now and every time he has been very polite, helpful, and accommodated my every need. I travel across the continent and internationally, and he has been able to give me the very best flights that were available. I will always use Alpha Flight Guru in the future.
